website_summaries.verdict: Feel good about spoiling your dog with these squashy textured treats containing salmon, salmon oil, and vitamin E for a healthier coat and skin.
pros: No grain, gluten, soy, corn, or artificial flavors
Dog-approved fishy taste with coat and skin enhancing ingredients
cons: Easy to overfeed if you don’t read the feeding guidelines

customer_reviews.title: They sure do love 'em.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well these work for skin and coat yet but they sure do love them. I have two Miniature Dachshunds and according to the directions, I split one chew between the two each morning. They each grab their half chew and swallow it down so fast I have to check to make sure all my fingers are still there! LOL UPDATE: About 1/2 way thru my first bag. The dogs still grab them each morning and swallow them down. They are definitely shedding less. Their skin is nice and soft. I've also noticed less scratching and biting themselves. The price is good and I'll be buying more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Texasdoxiemama

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: First, both of my dogs enjoy the treats. The fact that it makes their coats softer and richer looking is a bonus. My 6 year old rat terrier mix has been taking these for about two months and she looks great. Her fur is softer and has a more silky feeling. I just adopted a new terrier mix puppy who has a wiry coat with the hair standing up on top of his head and down his back, giving the appearance of a mohawk. He has been taking these for about a week and I will update this review with further details on how it has affected his coat.
customer_reviews.author: GMakTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as a regular treat, and a helpful supplement too.
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. I've got a mini Australian Shepherd that gets itchy dry skin in the winter, to the point that I was finding scabs under all his fur from where he'd been scratching. These things have helped enormously with the problem. I give them as after-breakfast treats every morning - he loves them just as much as he does his regular doggy treats, so there's no epic battle to get him to take the supplement. As an added bonus, they're grain-free, which is fantastic if your pup has any grain allergies (like mine).
customer_reviews.author: L. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for my Pomeranian's back hair, all back within weeks! Fluffier than ever...
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian is about 12 years old and her back hair suddenly started disappearing. Nothing wrong according to multiple vets, but online I read that it might be some kind of generic Pomeranian condition. I felt bad seeing her in such a less-fluffy state that before giving up, I decided to try these supplements. Lo and behold... weeks later, she is miraculously back to her old fluffy hair. This was incredible! She even looks happier than with hair. Sold!
customer_reviews.author: AK_RR

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Skin & Coat Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old rat terrier has suddenly started losing hair on her head and by her tail with age. I have been giving her Cloud Star's other dog treats for the past couple years and she loves them, so I wanted to try the Skin & Coat treats as well. I went through a few bags with her over a few months and although she loves the taste of these treats, they did absolutely nothing to help her grow back or keep any hair.
customer_reviews.author: Telee

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my fur girl had flaky skin and her nails were splitting. The groomer recommended taking fish oil. I picked these because they were reasonably priced and were recommended by other dog owners. She loves loves the taste; it's like a treat to her. Her coat is getting better, but her nails still split, so I don't know if it's related or if she just needs to take them for a longer length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, and shiny coat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. He takes his “vitamins” every morning when his humans take theirs. I don’t know how long he had been taking them but one day I just realized how much more shiny and soft his coat was! They really work and apparently taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: My chug has dry skin and struggles with dermatological health. When seasons change he is miserable. This treat/vitamin has changed his whole life! His fur is luscious once more, through a season change even which is astounding!! Great product that my pup eats easily and with no fuss. Portions are easy to figure out for pups weight and treats are easy to divide up however necessary. I will always make sure this product is in my house for my pup to take daily.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Cookson-McCauley

customer_reviews.title: They got rid of my dogs shedding problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my dog (lab mix) would shed so so so much, like clumps of hair everyday... needless to say I needed to vacuum twice a day. Well, I bought these and started giving him 2 a day for the first week, and then one every day after that and i must say i see a huge difference in his coat. He isn't shedding like usual! Some hair but not clumps! I recommend this to you if your dog is shedding like crazy. It even makes him behave! haha
customer_reviews.author: Zana Gashi

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these, I call them "Your pretty treats"
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these,I call them "Your pretty treats"..My puos were itching and scratching horribly.After one month all better.My pups are small less than15lbs,says to give only half the treat.I just give them the one in morning.Love these fot my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: I like that they are small enough that I can hold ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to give our dog that might help with his excessive shedding and found these treats. They appear to help and the dog loves them. I like that they are small enough that I can hold a few in one hand but not too small that the dog will struggle to find them if I toss one (he's terrible at catching food in his mouth).
customer_reviews.author: Charlene W.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats and so does is skin. I give to my pup everyday and this is the best price you will ever find. I love this company we also buy the stomach treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soft and shiny coat
customer_reviews.text: been giving these to my dog daily for several months. she has a beautiful soft and shiny coat. will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: Dog eats them
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these. Paired with hills sensitive skin and hair he has changed the quality of his coat. He is also very spoiled and picky but he eats these no issue
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and are better than I expected. I have tried many many many treats for my very picky shih tzu with skin problems. These treats have not made her condition worst, and if anything they have helped. My dog loves them and is always excited when I open the bag. These treats are definitely a value but worth the money. I will continue using these treats for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: These actually work! Soft, silky, itch-free puppy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when trying these, but they really seem to be working well with my German Shepherd puppy's coat. She has dry skin (breed trait) and was itching and scratching a lot. Her coat also was rather course. After not even a week of taking these, she has stopped itching almost entirely and her coat feels very soft and silky. She also loves them just as much, if not more than other treats.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: My neighbors dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my three dogs. 2 Saint Bernards and a Dachshund/Chihuahua mix all rescues. They don't get a lot of treats and for whatever reason they don't really care for them. They'll eat them eventually but begrudgingly and with no enthusiasm whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quality budget option
customer_reviews.text: I was giving salmon oil to my dog and one of my cats, but these are a much easier and less-smelly option. I give 2 to him and 1/2 to the cat and their coats are gorgeous! I think they may have looked a *little* better on the salmon oil, but for the price this can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing treats; just wish the packaging would stop breaking!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and all it stands for so I wanted to try these treats when my pup was experiencing skin issues. He eats them like a treat and they definitely seem to help him. The only issue I have is with the packaging. The little clear zipper built into the inside of the bag breaks with every bag which makes them unsealable. I have experimented by placing them in a Ziploc style bag however they get extremely dried out and hard and then my pup refuses to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: UFKeL

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like them
customer_reviews.text: They are soft and I cut them in thirds because my dogs are only, 3.25 lbs, and 8 pounds,
customer_reviews.author: M. Frailey-Roehning

customer_reviews.title: Have done wonders for sensitive skin dog
customer_reviews.text: I give my sensitive skin dog two of these a day and her skin & and coat look amazing. My husband was out of town for a month when I started these treats and he was amazed at the difference.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes these. I haven’t noticed a big change in his coat yet but he enjoys these as a morning and evening treat. They are not as strong smelling as another brand I tried but I have had comments that his breath smells fishy.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These may be chewy for bigger dogs with teeth. For small dogs, though, not that great. Size is too big for small dogs and too difficult to "chew" for dogs with little to no teeth. The dogs like them. I just have to cut them into small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: flannb

customer_reviews.title: Mouth watering
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about the suckers but whenever I pull these out my dogs mouth waters so much she leaves a puddle on the floor before I even finish opening up the package. So five stars from my boxer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but dogs changed their minds.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs were crazy about these but after some months they lost interest. I don't if the product changed or they just talked it over and decided to stop eating them. ;) They could be picky at times.
customer_reviews.author: DelNana

customer_reviews.title: Love them am on my 2nd bag
customer_reviews.text: My dogs both like them and that's saying something because my 11.5yr female has gotten picky in her old age. Definitely notice the difference in her fur too she has always had a very thin coat and now there is some depth to it almost fluffy and much much softer.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1230

customer_reviews.title: they were fine. He would eat them
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my dog was scratching himself a lot, so I thought it would help with his coat. He had this and another salmon oil treat. Neither really worked. As treats, they were fine. He would eat them, but they were not his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: PiggyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been fighting doggie dandruff, dull coat, and odor for months with our Lab. This isn't a miracle treat (it turns out our lab had a skin yeast infection which corrected with medication) BUT, I gave her these for 2 weeks before our visit and noticed an immediate (2-3 day) and significant change in the appearance of her coat during that time. I continue to give her these treats and love the way it made my old dog's coat like a puppy's again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dubil

customer_reviews.title: I give her good food for her coat but this can only help
customer_reviews.text: My Maltipoo loves these. I give her good food for her coat but this can only help. She's tiny so I give her half every day or two.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Can’t see effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: I give my dog zesty and he loved it but it was too expensive. I tried these he LOVES THEM! but if you ask me...I can’t tell the difference between him not taking it and him taking 1 a day.
customer_reviews.author: matias

customer_reviews.title: My dog, Dr Blue, loves them
customer_reviews.text: I assume these taste good Dr Blue loves them. I think they're expensive I really haven't noticed a change in his hair or skin. Their seems to be a lot of starch in them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: As an English Bulldog owner, I am very aware of potential skin problems with this breed. These treats are very good. My dog gets one before bed time and his coat is perfect and he has no skin issues, even after a bath. I highly recommend Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Skin and Coat for all dogs.
customer_reviews.author: NWgal

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully over time her skin and coat will look and feel good again.
customer_reviews.text: I hope this product will help my little girl quit chewing on her paws. So far I've been giving her the skin & coat supplements for about one week and have seen a slight improvement. Hopefully over time her skin and coat will look and feel good again.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Morehead

customer_reviews.title: Great  product
customer_reviews.text: My dogs fur and skin are in much better condition since using these dog chews, he goobles them up quickly and since hes a picky eater thats amazing.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would work for my dog but it didn't do a thing. He's a big dog and it took some coaxing to get him to eat the vitamins (he's also picky). There was no change in his skin or coat.
customer_reviews.author: Char55

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them! It also does well with their diet
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them! It also does well with their diet. Most other treats that contain wheat and chicken bother my Frenchie.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Coat is nice and bright and healthy.
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes the "treats" and they seem to reduce her shedding. Coat is nice and bright and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dog Treat
customer_reviews.text: Our Chocolate Lab has dry skin. I discovered these treats while on vacation in a roadside store. The ingredients are natural & free if preservatives & gluten so I purchased a bag. My dog absolutely loves this dog treat. Within 30 days his scratching & skin problems greatly improved. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: LJW

customer_reviews.title: Well loved by our pet
customer_reviews.text: Well loved by our pet! Can't say there was any night or day difference in his very sensitive skin, but no adverse reaction and he liked them!
customer_reviews.author: Mashdi

customer_reviews.title: Excited puppy
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very happy with her new goodies. Her coat is shedding & needed something extra to help.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Bryant

customer_reviews.title: My wolfhound loves em
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater, he spits out treats he doesnt love. These are down the hatch
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they work, but they don't hurt
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if they're making a difference, but I THINK so. Either way, my dogs love them, and my cats try to get them. These are a regular purchase now.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Brzezinski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ms. Bee loves them as soon as I get one out she is gone with it. Works kinda ok.
customer_reviews.author: MsLady

customer_reviews.title: Grain-free, Pups like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dachshunds (15 lb) - I have to break it in half to follow the feeding guidelines, but they are soft enough to do that easily. My pups like them (they like any soft treat really) and I like that they are grain-free. We'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Happy to buy them through Amazon to save money from ...
customer_reviews.text: My greyhound loves the taste of these and her shedding (to the point of balding) is now under control. Happy to buy them through Amazon to save money from the boutique pet store prices..
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog’s coat so soft!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and after 2 weeks her coat became very shiny and noticeably softer
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: dog likes them
customer_reviews.text: too soon to see if its makes a difference in her coat but she eats them right up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved these! They had to be cut in half
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these! They had to be cut in half, as she is a mini poodle. But she ate them immediately ne wanted more! Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: The Antonios

customer_reviews.title: Doggy and owner approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the taste and I can see and feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Older Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have used with 2 of my older dogs 10+ yrs of age and has helped with there arthritis that they now have. I will continue to use on my older dogs. Great price and I give as a treat to my dogs and they just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possibly treated my dog's hair loss
customer_reviews.text: We will never know if this medication treat healed my dogs fur or if it was an antifungal spray or a bit of both, but she went from having hair loss all over to being more lush than before.
customer_reviews.author: sue of sf

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the shine!
customer_reviews.text: My pup Lou has been eating these treats for over a year now. He loves the flavor and his coat stays super soft and shiny. he is allergic to chicken, so the salmon flavor works for him.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kutscher

customer_reviews.title: Treats.
customer_reviews.text: He loves the treats. He is a very picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Her coat is also 100% better. I also started brushing her weekly
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old lab went from a scratching fool to scratching just every so often. Her coat is also 100% better. I also started brushing her weekly. She hates it on her old body but it helps keep her comfortable. I’ve started my new bird dog on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Her coat looks better.
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes them and her coat looks a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: M W Brown

customer_reviews.title: They are large treats for small dogs and are only ...
customer_reviews.text: They are large treats for small dogs and are only allowed 1 per day, which I found odd. My sheltie enjoys them regardless
customer_reviews.author: yesthatsthespot

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is our dog's fave morning treat and she loves them. Have on subscribe & save so we don't run out!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Ammerman

customer_reviews.title: Great high-quality treats
customer_reviews.text: These treats are an interesting shape but PERFECT for slicing up into smaller training treats as well as using whole. They're high-reward (fragrant, yummy) treats at a good price. Healthy, good for the skin and fur, my dogs literally do back-flips for these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hi-value treat
customer_reviews.text: I compete my Berner in drafting, she's not super crazy about being hooked up, but these treats change her mind, or help her over that hump! As far as I know, these are NOT sourced from China....PLEASE let me know if I'm wrong!!!!
customer_reviews.author: V. HOLT

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement. Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding my dog these every day since I got her in April. She loves them and her coat is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I'm not faulting the product, but I couldn't get ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not faulting the product, but I couldn't get my dog to eat it. I even offered one to my aunt's Labrador who eats everything, but to my surprise, my aunt's Lab refused to eat it either!
customer_reviews.author: Holly C. Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about its effectiveness as I've only been using it for a month, but I'm hoping it'll help with my dog's itching in the hot, dry heat.
customer_reviews.author: sts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it and I think his sink and coat is not as dry because of it....
customer_reviews.author: Elaine E. Blaschke

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Star Skin & Coat Treats
customer_reviews.text: Good, well-accepted by my dogs. Seems to have been effective in helping their coats get healthier-looking/shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Gisell375

customer_reviews.title: Dog Goes Crazy for Them!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how much my dog loves these! She will do anything I ask her to if I have one of these in my hand. She is a small dog, about 12 pounds, so these are a bit large for her. I break each treat into three servings and it allows me to stretch the goodness a little bit further!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the dogs actually love them.
customer_reviews.text: Healthy treat for the dogs, and the dogs actually love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Healthy dog!
customer_reviews.text: My girl is tough to get medication into so these and their coat/nails formula are great ways to get the needed nutrients into my dogs diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these treats
customer_reviews.text: Both we and our dogs love these treats! The dogs love the flavor and we love the shiny, silky coats that our dogs have when they are given these treats regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Maxfield

customer_reviews.title: less shedding and a nice shine. I will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using dynamo for about two months i’ve notice the difference on my dogs coat,... less shedding and a nice shine .I will buy it again .
customer_reviews.author: Hope carreon

customer_reviews.title: All three dogs love these as an after walk treat
customer_reviews.text: All three dogs love these as an after walk treat. The itchy dog seems to not scratch as much after a month of the recommended dosage.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these treats and they are a nice portion for ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats and they are a nice portion for their snack. The best part is they contain vitamin E and salmon oil and they are Grain Free, Gluten Free, All Natural, Made in the USA, and free of wheat, free of corn, free of soy, no artificial colors, no artificial flavors, no byproducts.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: My border collie loves them! I like them because they're not too big, so I dont feel bad about giving a treat to her more frequently without having to break a treat in half.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Harden

customer_reviews.title: Fav dog treat
customer_reviews.text: One of our dogs’ fav treats. Very easy to chew and easy to break into smaller portions for little dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Madigan

customer_reviews.title: Good treat and made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Good soft treat that is reasonably priced. The softness makes it easy for me to break into two pieces for the recommend serving. My dog seems to like them but haven't noticed any change in his coat after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Super Silky Coat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! He gets 2 every morning. They make his coat super silky and shiny. And he no longer has flakes of skin in him after we pet him. I will definitely keep buying this for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: And I was excited that the bag was larger than what I previously had!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Walters

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My black lab loves these treats! I have noticed a change in her coat, she does not have the flaking she used to.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee R.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs get one after their walk and they go crazy ...
customer_reviews.text: Dogs get one after their walk and they go crazy for them. Hopefully I'll see a decrease in scratching soon.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E.

customer_reviews.title: Two big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Two big dogs.........one liked and the other one would not eat them......
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Both my dogs (an australian cattle dog and a pomeranian spitz) like the taste enough
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say these are miracle treats for my dogs' dry, itchy skin, but they do seem to help. Both my dogs (an australian cattle dog and a pomeranian spitz) like the taste enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Prater

customer_reviews.title: We have a small dog and he most of the ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a small dog and he most of the time loves these treats. Every once in a while though he chooses not to eat them. He is a poodle mix though and I understand they can get picky.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: these soft chews could be pinched off into small bits ...
customer_reviews.text: these soft chews could be pinched off into small bits which worked well for training purposes and they were nutritionally fortified.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: They love them and they're made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I can only give my pup grain free items. They love them and they're made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: NEIL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tasted them but my dog seems to like them
customer_reviews.author: s wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Snacks!
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves these soft chews. He's a picky eater too. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Firelizzard

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: and they help with his itching and scratching. These are sometimes at the pet store, and sometimes they are not. Therefore, I bought them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sew It Seams

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them and the rattle of the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Although I didn't taste, the dog loves them. I believe his coat started to improve with the week. He is a black lab and his coat should be shiney and now it is. Convenient size package.
customer_reviews.author: Muh

customer_reviews.title: they keep my lucky dog from scratching
customer_reviews.text: i have tried a variety of the dog coat treats for my jack russel. she seems to get better results with the soft chew kind. they have all worked to keep her allergy/scratching to a minimum and it helps with shedding too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I don't like it, my dogs just turn their nose up at these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Twigless

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this works
customer_reviews.text: One dog will eat anything. The other dog is pickier and this is tougher and large pieces and he hates it. Spits it out. Not sure if they did anything for their coat. Doesnt have a strong odor or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, and the dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for being tasty (as far as I can tell) and healthy! Used to buy these at the grocery store all the time before the re-branding, now I have to buy them on Amazon. Dog still loves them and I don't mind the ingredients list.
customer_reviews.author: George Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Rufus loves Cloud Star!
customer_reviews.text: Cloud Star Skin and Coat has been great for Rufus. He likes the taste. Coat is shiny and soft - no skin issues. Would recommend - and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Created an Allergic Reaction!
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for these treats but I am extremely disappointed. After only two, my lab had some kind of allergic reaction to these treats and her eyes became so swollen (one almost swelling shut). Thankfully with an emergency vet call, 48 hours off of the treats and several doses of Benadryl my pup is fine and back to normal. We had quite the scare. I don't understand why she reacted the way she did as she eats food that has many of the same ingredients. If you are thinking of purchasing these, I would suggest the small bag at Petco before purchasing this larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Latendresse

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and my dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy, ok to give to my dog that has allergies and he loves them! Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is crazy about these and is learning commands very fast with these as an incentive. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because the are very pricey.
customer_reviews.author: ChiaBee

customer_reviews.title: and five days later there is great improvement!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy was on different food and had severely dry skin (evident in picture 1) and so I did some reading, switched her food to Merrick Puppy Recipe, and started Dynamo Skin & Coat, and five days later there is great improvement!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my Labrador with itchy skin and keep his coat looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my dog, Shila loves the taste but I haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog, Shila loves the taste but I haven't seen any difference in her shedding or her coat. I will probably buy another bag.
customer_reviews.author: mommomdyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a cocker spaniel with food allergies. He LOVES them and they have significantly decreased his scratching. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mia058

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it! I cut these into half to use for Training
customer_reviews.author: Aj

product_meta.title: Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Skin & Coat, Functional Soft Chews, Salmon with Omega 3, Vitamin E, Grain Free
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Salmon| Size:14oz.Give your dog the chance to look and feel his best with Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Functional Treat for skin and coat. Each chewy dog treat includes the nutrients and vitamins your dog needs for a shiny coat and healthy skin support, no matter what breed or age. Each soft dog chew is made with real salmon, salmon oil and vitamin E, to support a luxurious coat and healthy skin. These dog skin and coat treats are all grain free. Plus, we leave out corn, soy and artificial colors and flavors, so each bite is both delicious and nutritious. • Grain free • Added fruits and vegetables • Includes salmon oil and vitamin E • Baked in the USA Give your dog the nutrition he needs and the flavor he wants with Cloud Star Dynamo Dog Functional Treat for skin and coat, and be sure he gets nothing but the best.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
